subcult-tv.name: subcult.tv
subcult-tv.description: The hub. This very site. Portfolio, manifesto, signal broadcast.
subcult-tv.longDescription: subcult.tv is the central node of the Subculture Collective network. It serves as our business homepage, project portfolio, zine archive, and Patreon funnel. Built with Vite, React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS with a VHS/punk/gothic aesthetic.
subcult-tv.whyItExists: Every collective needs a signal tower. This is ours.

signal-noise.name: Signal // Noise
signal-noise.description: Audio processing toolkit for lo-fi and glitch aesthetics.
signal-noise.whyItExists: Clean audio is a lie. We wanted tools to reveal the static underneath.

dead-letter-drop.name: Dead Letter Drop
dead-letter-drop.whyItExists: Privacy is not a feature. It's a right. We built the tool we needed.
